desc.1: Unleashes up to 4 slashes. The first 3 hits deal <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>, the 4th hit deals <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.

desc.0: After unleashing the 3rd hit of the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, hold down or pause for a short while, and then press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a downward strike that deals <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Slashes all nearby enemies, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Slashes enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.1: Unleashes an upward slash that deals <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd hit of the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</ct>.
desc.3: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a powerful upward slash that deals massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd hit of her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a powerful upwards slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area followed by several downward strikes, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Slashes enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Perform a spinning slash against enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core.name: Core Passive: Fluctuating Voltage
desc: Launch a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> for an extra <ct color=#2BAD00>32%</ct> Daze.

Launch a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> for an extra <ct color=#2BAD00>37.3%</ct> Daze.

Launch a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> for an extra <ct color=#2BAD00>42.6%</ct> Daze.

Launch a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> for an extra <ct color=#2BAD00>48%</ct> Daze.

Launch a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> for an extra <ct color=#2BAD00>53.3%</ct> Daze.

Launch a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> for an extra <ct color=#2BAD00>58.6%</ct> Daze.

Launch a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> after the 3rd hit of Anby's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> for an extra <ct color=#2BAD00>64%</ct> Daze.

desc.0: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
desc.1: When Anby's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> hits an enemy, she gains an extra 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 5s.

1.name: Rapid Charge Mode
1.desc: When the 4th hit of Anby's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> hits an enemy, her Energy Generation Rate is increased by 12% for 30s.

flavor.0: "Charge up for just a minute, and you're set to fight for an hour!" That's the sales pitch for these weapon expansion modules.

2.name: Precision Discharge
2.desc: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</ct> hits a Stunned enemy, its DMG is increased by 30%. When Anby's <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> hits an enemy that is not Stunned, the Daze inflicted is increased by 10%.

flavor.0: "Electric shocks will knock you out cold."
flavor.1: Looking at the enemy out cold at her feet, she added:
flavor.2: "At least, that's what happens in the movies."

3.name: Well-Disciplined
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
3.flavor: Run, slash, move like lightning. She is no amateur when it comes to Hollowsâ€”she's an expert.

4.name: Conducting Charge

desc.0: When Anby launches a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> or uses her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, off-field Electric Agents recover 3 Energy.
desc.1: For every 12% Energy Generation Rate Anby has, recover an additional 2 Energy, up to a maximum of 6.

4.flavor: You won't last long fighting solo. An experienced Hollow Raider knows how to create opportunities for their teammates.

5.name: Street Experience
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
5.flavor: Working for the Cunning Hares not only builds your mental toughness but also helps (or rather, forces) you to get in shape.

6.name: Charging Field
6.desc: When Anby uses her <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks). When she hits an enemy with her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing that attack's DMG by 45%.

flavor.0: Coils of electricity flickered over her fingertips.
flavor.1: Anby raised her head, eyes brimming with determination beyond her years.
flavor.2: Perhaps, one day, she will be the one with total mastery over electricity.
